short_description: meishoku is a meat production & processing company based in kakogawa, japan.
generated_description: meishoku, legally known as meishoku co. ltd., is a food manufacturing and wholesale company based in kakogawa, hyogo prefecture. established in 1969, the company specializes in producing a variety of meat products, including high-quality beef, frozen foods, and traditional japanese meat dishes such as black pork stew. meishoku is committed to maintaining high standards of quality and food safety, supported by rigorous quality management systems and continuous product development. the company employs approximately 235 people and has received various certifications, including iso9001:2015 and iso22000:2018. meishoku's product range includes meat packs, frozen foods, and various meat-based snacks, all crafted with a focus on authenticity and traditional techniques.
